html:
3.2.22  7:15 pm   Thoughts on Ancient Greece? Asking for a friend. 

      seems brand new

3.2.22  5:20 pm   What inspired you to make the switch to 3d in "here comes the sun"?

      i didn't switch for that one. i first used it in "history of the entire world" because i felt i needed a globe to show so many diverse locations properly. then i've been using bits of 3D ever since. but then eventually i decided to go all in and start one of the music videos 100% in 3D. this was for "i'm a princess". this either ruined my life or saved it, i still can't tell

3.2.22  4:20 pm   Is your next song absolutely epic

      well,

3.2.22  3:11 pm   do you find yourself thinking more and more in song the more and more songs you make?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.2.22  2:31 pm   how many times is the word "anyway" in your next song/video

      0

3.2.22  1:50 pm   What do you do when you have artblock or writer's block?

      try to unwrite something

3.2.22  12:20 pm   where in your schedule do you find the time to answer all of these questions?

      how about Wednesday, March 2, 2022 11:14:25 PM

3.2.22  12:11 pm   why is it toothbrush when you brush multiple teeth and not just one tooth? shouldnt it be teethbrush?

      yes thank you i will change it

3.2.22  10:27 am   Ideas for a budget road trip?

      go sideways, across the road insead of along it. much shorter distance

3.2.22  8:38 am   is reality actually fake

      no

3.2.22  8:27 am   Hello, I was just curious to ask you this. But, how long does it take you (normally) to make a song?

      i wonder if that's even possible

3.2.22  8:04 am   When did you finish the song for I'm scared?

      dec 27, 2021

3.2.22  6:02 am   are you good at drawing?

      whatever gets the job done

      probably about 87

      i'm wondering why people have been using skyrockets improperly

      yes

3.2.22  12:02 am   why am i so mad at the essay i'm writing

      perhaps you............ ~care~

      i'm not sure

3.1.22  9:23 pm   i forgot who i am. do you have any tips on how to remember?

      write a story about who you might be

3.1.22  6:19 pm   William, Please it's been 6 years since the first word unscramble WHAT IS IT?????!!!!!!!!!

      i'm pretty sure the answer to the first is shown in the second unscramble video

3.1.22  5:53 pm   What the heck is a "township"?

      not a town. anything other than a town. your front porch may be a town ship

3.1.22  5:48 pm   help i'm auditioning for a jazz summer school thing and i dont actually know good jazz standards for improvising pls recommend (am on sax)

      harlem shake

3.1.22  5:28 pm   how do u feel ab the new month

      pretty good

3.1.22  5:15 pm   we all know that the day goes on, but does the night go on?

      yes

3.1.22  4:31 pm   do tunes just come to your head and you need words for them or is it the other way around

      best case scenario is both together

3.1.22  3:52 pm   does the upcoming video have a person/people in it

      yes

3.1.22  3:51 pm   why are you like this

      how do you think i am

3.1.22  3:31 pm   whats your favourite song that you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.1.22  2:08 pm   Is an oreo a sandwich yes or no?

      yes

3.1.22  1:37 pm   why can't i see the future

      you can but it's many different futures. sometimes so many it's blinding. how do you choose

3.1.22  1:29 pm   is "the" the first word of your next song?

      no

      that sounds enticing

      i've never had the opportunity to think about sparrows

3.1.22  11:05 am   how do you feel about ducks?

      i know they can fly but i've never seen them do it

3.1.22  10:35 am   do the words "hope" and/or "believe" appear in your next song?

     no

      if so, how many times?

3.1.22  8:32 am   will the person whose name isn't steve (unsteve) from "hi, i'm steve" return in a future video?

      at any particular moment, it will seem like no, but over time i think you'll realize the answer to be yes

3.1.22  7:05 am   What was the last thing you learned that impressed you ? 

      what shape the world is

3.1.22  6:33 am   I've created a short tune, but I don't know how to arrange it to sound good. It also doesn't sound like one where it'd have lyrics (closer to, say, a video game track). I'm still kind of split on what to do. Any advice?

      do another one

3.1.22  3:41 am   whats the thought process for videos like ball & stick? is it just like writing a song or something else

      i try to imagine what a thought process would be like, in paradise

      "the", etc

      i have bad and good news for you. the bad news is no one knows. the good news is you might know

      i've barely ever written a song not about that
